member.name: F:CCWin.CCSkinForm.CornerColors
member.summary: 圆角阴影的颜色。[0]为阴影内沿颜色，[1]为阴影外沿颜色。 注：一般来讲，圆角阴影内沿的颜色应当比四边阴影内沿的颜色更深，才会有更好的显示效果。此值应当根据您的实际情况而定。
member.remarks: 由于给扇面上渐变时，起点并不是准确的扇面内弧，因此扇面的内沿颜色可能应比四边的内沿颜色深

member.name: M:CCWin.SkinControl.cStoreDc.CreateDCA(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: 函数功能：该函数通过使用指定的名字为一个设备创建设备上下文环境。
member.param: 指向一个以Null结尾的字符串的指针，该字符串为显示驱动指定DISPLAY或者指定一个打印驱动程序名，通常为WINSPOOL。
指向一个以null结尾的字符串的指针，该字符串指定了正在使用的特定输出设备的名字，它不是打印机模式名。LpszDevice参数必须被使用。
该参数在32位应用中被忽略；并置为Null，它主要是为了提供与16位应用程序兼容，更多的信息参见下面的注释部分。
指向包含设备驱动程序的设备指定初始化数据的DEVMODE结构的指针，DocumentProperties函数检索指定设备获取已填充的结构，如果设备驱动程序使用用户指定的缺省初始化值。则lplnitData参数必须为Null。
member.returns: 返回值：成功，返回值是特定设备的设备上下文环境的句柄；失败，返回值为Null。

member.name: M:CCWin.SkinControl.cStoreDc.CreateDCW(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: 函数功能:该函数通过使用指定的名字为一个设备创建设备上下文环境

member.name: M:CCWin.SkinControl.cStoreDc.CreateDC(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: 函数功能:该函数通过使用指定的名字为一个设备创建设备上下文环境

member.name: M:CCWin.SkinControl.cStoreDc.CreateCompatibleDC(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: 该函数创建一个与指定设备兼容的内存设备上下文环境（DC）。通过GetDc()获取的HDC直接与相关设备沟通，而本函数创建的DC，则是与内存中的一个表面相关联。

member.name: F:CCWin.SkinControl.ScrollBarHelper.WM_MOUSELEAVE
member.summary: WM_MOUSELEAVE 是鼠标离开窗口时发出的消息，但是这个消息与普通的鼠标消息不同，要收到WM_MOUSELEAVE消息必须先调用TrackMouseEvent， 并且每调用一次TrackMouseEvent 窗口只能收到一次WM_MOUSELEAVE，也就说如果要获得WM_MOUSELEAVE消息的话，当鼠标重新进入窗口时必须调 用一次TrackMouseEvent。

member.name: M:CCWin.SkinControl.ScrollBarHelper.OffsetRect(CCWin.SkinControl.ScrollBarHelper.RECT@,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: OffsetRect函数将指定的矩形移动到指定的位置
member.param: [输入输出]指向一个RECT结构，其中包含了被移动矩形的逻辑坐标
[输入]指定的矩形左右移动的量。当向左移动的时候，这个参数必须是一个负值
[输出]指定的矩形上下移动的量。当想上移动的时候，这个参数应该是一个负值。
member.returns: 如果函数成功，返回非0，否则返回0。

member.summary: GetWindowLong是一个函数。该函数获得有关指定窗口的信息，函数也获得在额外窗口内存中指定偏移位地址的32位度整型值。

member.name: T:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST
member.summary: Location of cursor hot spot returnet in WM_NCHITTEST.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTERROR
member.summary: On the screen background or on a dividing line between windows (same as HTNOWHERE, except that the DefWindowProc function produces a system beep to indicate an error).

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTTRANSPARENT
member.summary: In a window currently covered by another window in the same thread (the message will be sent to underlying windows in the same thread until one of them returns a code that is not HTTRANSPARENT).

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTNOWHERE
member.summary: On the screen background or on a dividing line between windows.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTCLIENT
member.summary: In a client area.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTCAPTION
member.summary: In a title bar.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTSYSMENU
member.summary: In a window menu or in a Close button in a child window.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTGROWBOX
member.summary: In a size box (same as HTSIZE).

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTMENU
member.summary: In a menu.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTHSCROLL
member.summary: In a horizontal scroll bar.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTVSCROLL
member.summary: In the vertical scroll bar.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTMINBUTTON
member.summary: In a Minimize button.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTMAXBUTTON
member.summary: In a Maximize button.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTLEFT
member.summary: In the left border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window horizontally).

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTRIGHT
member.summary: In the right border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window horizontally).

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTTOP
member.summary: In the upper-horizontal border of a window.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTTOPLEFT
member.summary: In the upper-left corner of a window border.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTTOPRIGHT
member.summary: In the upper-right corner of a window border.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTBOTTOM
member.summary: In the lower-horizontal border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window vertically).

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTBOTTOMLEFT
member.summary: In the lower-left corner of a border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window diagonally).

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTBOTTOMRIGHT
member.summary: In the lower-right corner of a border of a resizable window (the user can click the mouse to resize the window diagonally).

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTBORDER
member.summary: In the border of a window that does not have a sizing border.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTCLOSE
member.summary: In a Close button.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCHITTEST.HTHELP
member.summary: In a Help button.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCCALCSIZE_PARAMS.rectNewForm
member.summary: Contains the new coordinates of a window that has been moved or resized, that is, it is the proposed new window coordinates.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCCALCSIZE_PARAMS.rectOldForm
member.summary: Contains the coordinates of the window before it was moved or resized.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCCALCSIZE_PARAMS.rectOldClient
member.summary: Contains the coordinates of the window's client area before the window was moved or resized.

member.name: F:CCWin.Win32.WinAPI.NCCALCSIZE_PARAMS.lpPos
member.summary: Pointer to a WINDOWPOS structure that contains the size and position values specified in the operation that moved or resized the window.
